text: Inene iNkosi yenu nguAllâh Owadala amazulu nomhlaba ngeentsuku ezintandathu Wabuya Wanyusela iTrone yaKhe ngentla3. Elungelelanisa imeko yezinto zonke. Akukho mthetheleli (unokuMcenga) ngaphandle kokuba Uvumile Yena. NguAllâh ke loWo, iNkosi yenu; nina nqulani Yena (Yedwa), ngoku ke ingaba aniyi kukhumbula
